definition: Zhengxing district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
Zhengxing district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning

sentences.english: We formulated and implemented a plan for restructuring and invigorating ten key industries.
sentences.chinese: 制定并实施十大重点产业调整振兴规划。

sentences.english: Developing grain economy is the premise to vitalizing the old industry base.
sentences.chinese: 发展粮食经济，是振兴老工业基地的前提。

sentences.english: It is another great strategical readjustment of the central government to rejuvenate the Old Northeast Industrial Base .
sentences.chinese: 振兴东北老工业基地是中央的又一重大战略调整。

sentences.english: And inorder to imptove national economy and to be the world famous brand.
sentences.chinese: 为振兴民族经济，争创世界名牌作出我们不懈的努力。

sentences.english: Revitalizing the Jilin old industrial base has new requirements for the higher vocational education.
sentences.chinese: 吉林老工业基地振兴赋予高等职业教育新的历史使命。

sentences.english: Retailers are hoping for brisk post-holiday sales.
sentences.chinese: 零售商么希望振兴节后市场销售。

sentences.english: All of this, the ultimate goal is to revitalize the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 而所有这些，最终目的都是为了振兴中华民族。

sentences.english: Jilin is opening wider to achieve a comprehensive revitalization of the main channels and strategic task.
sentences.chinese: 扩大开放是实现吉林全面振兴的主要途径和战略任务。

sentences.english: The Trade Union Congress put forward a plan for national recovery.
sentences.chinese: 工会大会提出一项振兴国家的计划。

sentences.english: Priority should be given to efficiency audit to vitalize old industrial bases.
sentences.chinese: 老工业基地振兴需要效益审计先行。

sentences.english: Education is the key link in developing economy.
Revitalising global agriculture will not be easy.
sentences.chinese: 振兴全球农业并不容易。

sentences.english: This five-star Laguna Beach hotel is an unforgettable spot to rejuvenate.
sentences.chinese: 这家五星级拉古纳海滩酒店是振兴一个难忘的地方。

sentences.english: Developing the new industrial district is an important way of promoting the northeast industry.
sentences.chinese: 发展新型产业区是振兴东北老工业基地的重要途径。

sentences.english: Vitalizing Shangyou tea economy depending upon the progress of science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 依靠科技进步，振兴上犹茶叶经济。

sentences.english: The Chinese light industry was revitalized in the 1980's.
sentences.chinese: 中国轻工业在20世纪80年代重新振兴起来。

definition: Fuxing district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei/Fuxing or Fuhsing township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
with great prospects for the future (idiom); well worth doing
modernization of agriculture, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations
